title: Reflected XSS on www.hackerone.com and resources.hackerone.com

profile.name: HackerOne
profile.about: Vulnerability disclosure should be safe, transparent, and rewarding.

vulnerability_information:
Good day :)

I hope your doing as well as can be during these difficult times.

I have found xss at 2 endpoints:

https://www.hackerone.com/resources/

and 

https://resources.hackerone.com

The payloads that work are here:

https://www.hackerone.com/resources/read/embed_mini/11690/122736?miniPop=false&alwaysCover=false&miniTitle=XSS+POC&miniColor=333333&miniLinkToTitle=true&miniUrl=http://example.com%22%22,})%3C/script%3E%3Csvg+onload=confirm(location)%3E&miniBg=FFFFFF&hideBg=true&width=380&height=330&sharing=true

https://resources.hackerone.com/resources/read/embed_mini/11690/122736?miniPop=false&alwaysCover=false&miniTitle=XSS+POC&miniColor=333333&miniLinkToTitle=true&miniUrl=http://example.com%22%22,})%3C/script%3E%3Csvg+onload=confirm(location)%3E&miniBg=FFFFFF&hideBg=true&width=380&height=330&sharing=true


I've attached screenshots, the xss is intermittent, I'm not sure why maybe a cookie, maybe ip blocking, I'm not sure, but it happens :)

If it helps for others I have no idea what I am doing most of the time and brute force try things until they work :) 

Always learning, always feeling I know so little, and so much to learn, its awesome working together we all contribute our knowledge and effort :)

I've been taking a break the last few weeks to help to support family in this time of need, any bounty that is awarded I'm adding hackforgood as a collaborator and donating 100% of the bounty.  

It is great that hackerone is implementing this option to let us if we are in the position to share to donate funds, we have the option via the platform :)

It was shared with me that "You can add hackforgood as a collaborator on your reports and weight your bounty percentage on how much you’d like to donate. Our team will submit donations at the end of each month to WHO’s Covid-19 Response Fund" hope it works here will give it a shot :)

As always I wish you well on your side of the screen, to your loved ones, and that you can find both mental and physical wellness as much as possible right now :)

-Eric

## Impact

xss on the site, low risk since a marketing site :)

If it helps for others I have no idea what I am doing most of the time and brute force try things until they work :)

Always learning, always feeling I know so little, and so much to learn, its awesome working together we all contribute our knowledge and effort :)

activities.message:
Hmm I tried to add hackforgood to collaborators and not an option, must not be in all programs yet :)  

If possible to add platform wide would be amazing, if not all good I can donate directly if a bounty is awarded :)

-Eric
activities.markdown_message:

activities.message:
Hi @todayisnew,

Thank you for your submission. Your report is currently being reviewed and the HackerOne triage team will get back to you once there is additional information to share.

Kind regards,
@chessmast3r
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @todayisnew,

Thank you for your submission. Your report is currently being reviewed and the HackerOne triage team will get back to you once there is additional information to share.

Kind regards,
@chessmast3r

activities.message: Hi @todayisnew - thanks for your report, I was able to reproduce the security vulnerability. This vulnerability is in a system of our of our vendors, so we'll coordinate a fix with them. We'll make sure to add the @hackforgood collaborator before awarding you a bounty. Stay safe and happy hacking!
activities.markdown_message: Hi @todayisnew - thanks for your report, I was able to reproduce the security vulnerability. This vulnerability is in a system of our of our vendors, so we'll coordinate a fix with them. We'll make sure to add the @hackforgood collaborator before awarding you a bounty. Stay safe and happy hacking!

activities.message: A donation to @hackforgood, as requested by @todayisnew. Thanks!
activities.markdown_message: A donation to @hackforgood, as requested by @todayisnew. Thanks!

activities.message: Thanks again, @todayisnew! We haven't heard from the vendor yet. We'll keep you posted as soon as we learn more.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks again, @todayisnew! We haven't heard from the vendor yet. We'll keep you posted as soon as we learn more.

activities.message:
Thanks for the kind bounty, and words :)

I'll see if I can add @hackforgood on some other reports to see if it works,

Wish you well on your side of the screen :)

-Eric
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks for the kind bounty, and words :)

activities.message: Hi @todayisnew - thanks again for your report! The vendor told us that they've deployed a fix. Would you mind retesting this? Thanks!
activities.markdown_message: Hi @todayisnew - thanks again for your report! The vendor told us that they've deployed a fix. Would you mind retesting this? Thanks!

activities.message:
Great work, I can verify this issue has been secured!

Thanks for all the hard work on Hackerones side, and hope everyone is as well as can be in the current circumstances :)

Wish you well on your side of the screen :)

-Eric

activities.message: The vendor let us know that they're OK with us publicly disclosing the vulnerability now that it is remediated!
activities.markdown_message: The vendor let us know that they're OK with us publicly disclosing the vulnerability now that it is remediated!

activities.message:
Thanks great to hear :)

Wish you and everyone else well on your side of the screen :)

-Eric
